conclusion: Analyze electric field inside capacitor before and after metal plate removal to determine force on charged particle.
Electric field before metal plate removal is E = V/d.
Electric field after metal plate removal is E' = V/(d - l).
Force on charged particle is F = qE'.
Acceleration of particle is a = qV/m(d - l).
Gravitational force on particle is F_g = mg.
Net force on particle is F_net = qV/m(d - l) - mg.
Acceleration is a = qV/m(d - l) - g.
Final acceleration of particle is a = qV/m(d - l) - g.
